DataElement.preferredName: Pediatric Oncologist Consultation Post Last Visit Occurrence Yes No Unknown Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether a patient/patient's parents visited a pediatric oncologist since the last clinical trials team visit.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pediatric Oncologist Consultation Post Last Visit Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Oncologists who specialize in treating children_A conference between two or more people to consider a particular question; the act of deliberating together; confering with another researcher, physician, or expert about an issue or a case._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A visit by a patient or study participant to a medical professional._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.
